footer.description: A collective curation platform for YouTube videos. Preserving and discovering valuable content together.

hero.description: A community dedicated to preserving and sharing the best YouTube videos. Old tutorials, traditional recipes, iconic memes, and more.

aboutPage.missionDescription: Monynha Fun is a video platform powered by Monynha Softwares, created to celebrate timeless, valuable content and promote tech inclusion. Our mission is to democratize access to cultural and educational videos — curating content that uplifts communities often ignored by mainstream platforms.
aboutPage.founderDescription: Software Engineer and founder of Monynha Softwares. Passionate about open-source, automation, and inclusive digital experiences.
aboutPage.philosophyDescription: Built with accessibility, transparency, and a strong social voice. Inspired by LGBTQIA+ pride and open technology movements.

rulesPage.rule1: Respect others’ identities, cultures, and backgrounds.
rulesPage.rule2: No hate speech, harassment, or misinformation.
rulesPage.rule3: Only YouTube links are allowed in submissions.
rulesPage.rule4: Videos must reflect genuine value: cultural, educational, historical or artistic.
rulesPage.rule5: The moderation team may remove inappropriate or low-quality content.
rulesPage.rule6: Be kind. This space is made to uplift — not gatekeep.
rulesPage.rule7: Monynha Fun is powered by open-source ideals. Community feedback is welcome.

contactPage.feedbackDescription: We’re open to hearing from creators, collaborators, and curious minds.
contactPage.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you shortly.
contactPage.errorMessage: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again.

q1.question: Can I upload my own videos?
q1.answer: Not directly. You can submit links to YouTube videos. Our system automatically enriches the metadata and makes it public.

q2.question: Are there restrictions on content?
q2.answer: Yes. We focus on videos with lasting value — educational, artistic, or historically relevant. Inappropriate or spammy content will be filtered.

q3.question: Is this platform open source?
q3.answer: Absolutely. You can access the source code at GitHub.com/Monynha-Softwares/video-vault.

q4.question: Can I contribute?
q4.answer: Yes! Check out our GitHub repo, suggest features, or submit pull requests.

q5.question: Who runs Monynha Fun?
q5.answer: It is developed by Monynha Softwares, an inclusive tech studio founded by Marcelo Santos, with support from the open-source community.
